name: feinted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
feint
to pretend to move, or to make a move, in a particular direction in order to deceive an opponent, especially in sports such as football or boxing: [ + to infinitive ] Callas feinted to pass the ball and then shot it into the net. He feinted a shot to the left.
